properties.description: The derived column and window components have been added to calculated the unique row index i.e rowNumber()

scriptLines:
preSQLs:['drop table if exists Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview','CREATE TABLE Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview(
     Column_1 varchar(80) null
     , Column_2 varchar(80) null
     , Column_3 varchar(80) null
     , Column_4 varchar(80) null
    , id int not null
)'],

postSQLs:['with getColNo as (
    select top 1
        id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview
    where trim(Column_2) = 'Views'
    and trim(Column_1) = 'Nth day'    
)
, date_extract as (
    select top 1
        cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 2)), 8) as date) as start_date
        , cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 1)), 8) as date) as end_date
        , b.id as select_id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join getColNo b
)
, date_range as ( 
    select 
        start_date
        , end_date
        , datediff(day, start_date, end_date) as no_days
        , select_id
    from date_extract
)
, final_table as (
    select
    cast(dateadd(day, cast(a.Column_1 as int), b.start_date) as datetime) as date
    , cast(trim(a.Column_2) as float) as val
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join date_range b
    where a.id between (b.select_id + 1) and (b.no_days + (b.select_id + 1))
)

--select * from final_table   

MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING final_table b
    ON a.channel = 'Website' 
    and a.sub_channel = 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
    and a.date = b.date 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.impression_by_date = b.val

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel, sub_channel,content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, impression_by_date)
  VALUES (
        'Website'
        , 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
        , b.date
        , 'Unspecified'
        , datename(month, b.date)
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date))
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, b.date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(b.date, -1)))) + 1)
        , datename(dw, b.date)
        , case when datename(dw, b.date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end
        , 'Unspecified'
        , b.val
        );','with getColNo as (
    select top 1
        id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview
    where trim(Column_2) = 'Event count'
    and trim(Column_1) = 'Nth day'
)
, date_extract as (
    select top 1
        cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 2)), 8) as date) as start_date
        , cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 1)), 8) as date) as end_date
        , b.id as select_id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join getColNo b
)
, date_range as ( 
    select 
        start_date
        , end_date
        , datediff(day, start_date, end_date) as no_days
        , select_id
    from date_extract
)
, final_table as (
    select 
        cast(dateadd(day, cast(a.Column_1 as int), b.start_date) as datetime) as date
        , cast(a.Column_2 as float) as val
        -- , b.select_id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join date_range b
    where a.id between (b.select_id + 1) and (b.no_days + (b.select_id + 1))
)
MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING final_table b
    ON a.channel = 'Website' 
    and a.sub_channel = 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
    and a.date = b.date 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.conversion_total_clicks = b.val

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel, sub_channel, content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, conversion_total_clicks)
  VALUES (
        'Website'
        , 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
        , 'Unspecified'
        , b.date
        , datename(month, b.date)
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date))
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, b.date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(b.date, -1)))) + 1)
        , datename(dw, b.date)
        , case when datename(dw, b.date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end
        , 'Unspecified'
        , b.val
        );','with getColNo as (
    select top 1
        id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview
    where trim(Column_2) = 'Average engagement time'
    and trim(Column_1) = 'Nth day'
)
, date_extract as (
    select top 1
        cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 2)), 8) as date) as start_date
        , cast(right((select Column_1 from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview where id = (b.id - 1)), 8) as date) as end_date
        , b.id as select_id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join getColNo b
)
, date_range as ( 
    select 
        start_date
        , end_date
        , datediff(day, start_date, end_date) as no_days
        , select_id
    from date_extract
)
, final_table as (
    select 
        cast(dateadd(day, cast(a.Column_1 as int), b.start_date) as datetime) as date
        , cast(a.Column_2 as float) as val
        -- , b.select_id
    from Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview a
    cross join date_range b
    where a.id between (b.select_id + 1) and (b.no_days + (b.select_id + 1))
)
--select * from final_table

MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING final_table b
    ON a.channel = 'Website' 
    and a.sub_channel = 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
    and a.date = b.date 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.time_spent_on_site_page_podcast_vodcast = b.val

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel, sub_channel,content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, time_spent_on_site_page_podcast_vodcast)
  VALUES (
        'Website'
        , 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
        , 'Unspecified'
        , b.date
        , datename(month, b.date)
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date))
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, b.date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(b.date, -1)))) + 1)
        , datename(dw, b.date)
        , case when datename(dw, b.date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end
        , 'Unspecified'
        , b.val
  );','drop table if exists Temp_Raw_GA_Engagement_Overview'],
